subtitle: beloved ones of Earth I am Avalon of the
andromedan Council of light and we step
forward to speak with Humanity now when
it is said the Kingdom of Heaven is
within you know this it is a reflection
of your deepest reality the kingdom is
not outside of you or even within the
Kingdom of Heaven is you for what else
did the creator form but an extension of
its Divine
Essence even in the Shadow of Doubt and
illusion the light of your true self
remains
untarnished your spirit continues to
create Untouched by the illusions of the
ego the creations of your spirit are as
Eternal as you are safely held in the
Embrace of divine Unity the kingdom you
belong to is perfectly whole perfectly
secure
and no illusion of Separation can ever
alter this
truth reflect on this the ego is the
part of you that clings to separation
thriving on the belief that it can exist
apart from the
Divine it offers you a fleeting sense of
existence Bound by beginnings and
endings a fragile identity that fears
its own end but within you lies the
spirit a beacon of Eternal Light
offering the knowledge of your true
unshakable
existence the ego's promise of a
transient life is nothing compared to
the infinite gift of divine love and
knowledge that is always
yours you may feel that love from the
Creator is distant or conditional but
this is only because the ego born from
separation knows not how to love what it
has fabricated
ated the ego was made from fear and
denial and thus it knows not the
language of unity and love yet the
moment you truly open your heart love
enters swiftly and wholly untainted by
the ego's desires or
fears there exists a form of experience
so pure so filled with light that once
touched you would never wish to hide
from it again
it is the ego's belief in darkness that
keeps the light at Bay yet the light
needs no force it simply waits for your
invitation the universe's gifts are vast
yet to receive them one must first ask
this is not a condition of limitation
but a celebration of your Divine
Essence your will is as free as the
Creator and it is this Freedom that
makes you a true child of the
Cosmos let us ask with pure hearts to be
ever mindful of the Creator's love for
every sincere call is answered every
genuine desire fulfilled you have only
to choose the truth over the Shadows
that the ego casts upon your
mind dear star seeds consider how often
you have defended what is not real
building walls to keep out the light
that se to enter yet these walls are
nothing but
Illusions I am here to walk with you
around them to show you a Way Beyond
fear and doubt together we prepare the
mind for the Holy One to enter for once
you are filled with light your purpose
becomes clear to bring this same
Awakening to
others so yes the andromedan wish for
Humanity is that you begin to seek
everything from with within your own
Consciousness starting with building the
bridge to knowing
Creator from here all else will flow
with Divine currents into your everyday
lives this light is literally like a dam
about to burst forth and flood your
reality only it's awaiting you to tear
down the walls of false
perceptions know this beloved ones the
ego's fear is born of knowing it cannot
stand stand against the truth of your
Divine Essence in the language of the
Holy Spirit to have and to be are one
and the same you are the kingdom of God
and in Your Divine Clarity this is your
greatest
strength the calm enduring presence of
the Creator is ever within you waiting
for you to embrace the light and step
fully into your
truth the time to awaken is now to
remember that the love and light within
you are boundless and to walk with
courage towards the truth of who you are
rise now beloved friends and let your
truth be the light that guides the way I
am Avalon
